about.heading:
Hello,
my name is Cameron Grigoriadis.
about.subheading: I love working with technology and helping others benefit from it.
about.text:
I started writing code back in middle school as a hobby and it quickly turned into a passion of mine. Beginning with websites, I gained more and more knowledge about programming until I was able to develop my first native application on iOS, Service Day. I pride myself on learning new things and try to preserve the same spirit that drove me to become a self-taught developer. At the same time I have gained a deeper understanding of hardware technologies and IT concepts. It brings me satisfaction to help others find solutions to their tech troubles, and I still take time to help close friends and relatives find their way through software and hardware issues, though much of it is remote nowadays.

I am currently searching for part-time work or internship opportunities related to iOS or web development or the IT field. I have foundational experience with a wide range of technologies and am eager to build on my skills. My desired position is one where I can hone my skills, learn from more experienced developers or technicians, while proving to be an asset to your team. Thank you for your consideration.

skills.title: Web Developer, RAPID, Inc.
skills.content:
Sep 2019 – Oct 2020

Designed and developed a new mobile and desktop food ordering and delivery experience

Utilized HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, jQuery, and Google Maps API

skills.title: Independent iOS Developer
skills.content:
2017 – Present

Independently developed and released an application for iOS, using Swift

Experienced using
  • Xcode
  • Git
  • Swift Package Manager, Carthage, CocoaPods
  • SwiftUI
  • Testflight

skills.title: IT Skills
skills.content:
Able to perform basic hardware-related tasks like RAM and SSD upgrades

Experienced in patiently providing remote support

Some networking training, including:
  • Handling network addresses
  • Calculating subnet masks
  • The TCP/IP model
  • Common hardware components

skills.title: Employee, Happy Yogurt (Escondido, CA)
skills.content:
2017 – 2018

Helped create a welcoming atmosphere for customers

Accurately fulfilled orders in a timely manner

Handled multiple responsibilities throughout the day, including running the store when the manager was out

Firsthand experience with the restaurant side of food ordering applications

skills.title: Internship, 3-Screens Studio (Escondido, CA)
skills.content:
Apr – Jun 2016

Three-month internship providing a taste of working at a software development company

Mentored on web development, project management, iOS development
